title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When using build 200201151, a bug is observed where search results are not selected in an external jar. The issue occurs when searching for references to a specific field.
OB: Currently, when searching for references to the field, no matches are shown in the method getTempDir().
EB: The expected behavior is to see 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the project using build 200201151. 
2. Perform a search for references to the specific field. 
3. Observe that no matches are selected in the method getTempDir().
